Nightly, learn if the demon voted that day
Start knowing 1 of 2 people is a specific minion
The minion is told that either you or the demon is their demon, and the demon is told that either you or the minion is their minion
If nobody is executed in the final 3, town wins. When you are attacked, another town may die instead
Nightly, choose someone to protect from the demon
Start with a list of 2 good players and 1 evil, you don't know which is which
If a team has not yet won 3 days after your death, you return to life and cannot be killed again by the same method
You can't die. Nightly, choose a living player, who is told they were visited by the Sailor. You or they are drunk until the start of the next night
Cannot be killed by the demon at night
If both of your living neighbors are good, neither can die

May register as some manner of evil to other role abilities, even after dying

+2 Outsiders

If the demon dies when there are 5 or more people alive, you become the demon

Nightly, choose a player. If they nominate someone, they die. This ability is disabled the moment 3 or less people remain alive

Nightly, choose a role. If a player with that role exists, they die. If nobody has the role, the storyteller decides who dies
Nightly, choose 3 living players. Each is informed that they have been selected. Each must individually choose whether to live or die. If all choose to live, all die
